parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the front wheel bearings can cause the vehicle to come to an abrupt and shuddering stop, potentially leading to loss of control, accidents, and injuries or fatalities, especially on wet roads.
symptoms: The front wheel bearings freeze up
causing the vehicle to stop suddenly
the front tire may slide out from under the vehicle
and the vehicle may experience vibrations or shuddering.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The instability of the Dunlop MT90B16 tire at high speeds (70 mph) on warm days can cause motorcycle riders to lose control, leading to severe injuries and potentially even death.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Powder Coating on Motorcycle Engine Causes Premature Abrasion
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The powder coating on the motorcycle engine can cause premature abrasion, leading to engine damage, reduced performance, and potentially, engine failure, which can result in accidents or leave the rider stranded.
symptoms: or premature wear on engine components.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ignition module can cause the engine to stall or fail to start, leading to a loss of vehicle control and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The engine stalls or dies while driving
the engine is difficult to start or will not start
the vehicle experiences misfires or rough idling.
